Topic.Title: Can I make text games using Mobile Phone?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello. I just want to ask if i can make text games using Mobile Phone.

 Everything was working great for me, but after about 30 minutes it was no longer working. (Screen was white and I couldn't do anything)
